strings.title: üëΩ Drunk Aliens üöÄ
strings.instructions1: The aliens in the Space are Drunk üç∫
strings.instructions2: When they collide, you lose a life.
strings.instructions3: Avoid their collision - DRAG THEM AWAY!

fields.name: Number of Draggables
fields.description: How many draggables should spawn in the start of the game? Min 2 Max 6

fields.name: Game Play Text
fields.description: The floating text to show when game just starts

fields.name: Collision Text
fields.description: The floating text to show when collision occurs

fields.name: Lost Text
fields.description: The floating text to show when spaceship gets lost

fields.name: Game Title
fields.description: The title that is displayed in the start menu

fields.name: Font Family
fields.description: Google fonts link to font to use in the game

fields.name: High Score Gained Text
fields.description: When you get a new high score

fields.name: Max Lives
fields.description: How many lives you initially have

fields.name: Enable Cursor
fields.description: Show/Hide Cursor on PC during the game (visible on main menu)
